name: MTLHazardTrackingMode
desc: The options you use to specify the hazard tracking mode.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: An option specifying that the default tracking mode should be used.

items.name: case untracked
items.desc: An option specifying that the app must prevent hazards when modifying this object's contents.

items.name: case tracked
items.desc: An option specifying that Metal prevents hazards when modifying this object's contents.
